title: Namespace Governance
description: Defines governance rules for an OV Namespace.

id.description: The DID of the namespace governance document.

namespace.description: The DID of the namespace this governance applies to.

governanceModel.description: The governance model used to manage this namespace.

id.description: DID of a governance body (e.g., DAO, committee, council).

role.description: The role of this body (e.g., Validator, Arbiter).

governanceBodies.description: List of governing entities managing this namespace.

votingThreshold.description: Percentage required for approval in voting-based governance.

proposalProcess.description: Reference to a Ceramic document explaining the proposal submission process.

decisionMaking.description: Rules for decision-making in the namespace.

resolutionService.description: The DID of a dispute resolution service or contract.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when this governance document was issued.
